entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-08-17
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Published windows forms application complains about missing runtime on windows 11 #106579
  • NetworkInterface.GetAllNetworkInterfaces does not work correctly on some iOS devices #106577
  • Native AOT Binaries still depend on libz.so #106566
    9.0.0

Closed

  • Add `JsonElement.GetPropertyCount()` #104692
    10.0.0
  • Update .NET Linux Build for .NET 9 #91826
    9.0.0
  • PInvoke Source generation stops after first method with `global using` #94150
    10.0.0
  • JIT: Assertion failed '!(checkUnusedValues && def->IsUnusedValue()) && "operands should never be marked as unused values"' during 'Lowering nodeinfo' #106480
    9.0.0
  • Debugger shows incorrect local variable values following an exception #106467
  • Port System.Reflection docs for .NET 9 APIs #105982
    9.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Workaround for #106521 #106578
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [release/9.0] Make GetPropertyCount public and fix its return value #106576
    area-System.Text.Json, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Blittable color #106575
    area-System.Numerics, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • [release/9.0-rc1] JIT: fix unused operand marking in LowerHWIntrinsicTernaryLogic #106574
    Servicing-consider, area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Include libz.a in native aot packages #106569
    area-System.IO.Compression
  • Remove legacy APIs for MCG support #106568
    area-Interop-coreclr, 10.0.0

Merged

  • Make GetPropertyCount public and fix its return value #106503
    area-System.Text.Json, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • JIT: fix unused operand marking in LowerHWIntrinsicTernaryLogic #106555
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Remove managed interfaces impls defined in CoreCLR #105965
    area-Interop-coreclr, 10.0.0

Updated

  • Copy published crossgen2 in artifacts/tests #80154
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Fix paltest_pal_sxs_test1 on illumos #105207
    area-PAL-coreclr, os-SunOS, community-contribution
  • Define _REENTRANT for SUNOS #104527
    area-PAL-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Add draft of runtime async ECMA-335 changes #104063
    area-Meta
  • Add Ubuntu 24.04 Helix Images to pipeline #106048
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Clarify XML comments for Utf8Parser.TryParse to reflect case insensitivity #103861
    area-System.Memory, community-contribution, 9.0.0
  • [RISC-V][LoongArch64] Pass structs containing empty struct arrays according to integer calling convention #106266
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-loongarch64, arch-riscv
  • Improve Guid v7 performance on Unix #106525
    area-System.Runtime, community-contribution
  • Use ProjectReferences in inbox src projects #106329
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, 10.0.0
  • Add Base64Url fuzzer #106509
    area-System.Buffers
  • Rewrite GetIndexOfFirstNonAsciiByte #104503
    area-System.Text.Encoding, community-contribution
  • JIT: Emitting more push instructions based on the push size #106516
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix stack overflow in the configuration source gen #106511
    area-Extensions-Configuration, source-generator, 9.0.0
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 2517651 #105829
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, linkable-framework
  • Track generic instantiations in ILLink #106370
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink
  • Adjust the vector docs to use langword instead of cref to preserve generic type information where relevant #106561
    area-System.Numerics

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-08-17
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • "dotnet build" hangs when called from test #42821
  • Reenable the containers secure basic registry test #42820

Closed

  • Support for `dotnet store --package <packageName>.nupkg` #42808

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix GetTargetPath hook point #42812
    untriaged, Area-ApiCompat
  • Temporary fix for the cppcli tests #42811
    untriaged, Area-NetSDK

Updated

  • Send "workload set not installed" messages #42683
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • Merging internal commits for release/8.0.4xx #42701
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Add `--arch` and `--os` options to commands that already support `--runtime` option #37429
    untriaged, Area-CLI
  • Update stage 0 to fix cppcli tests #42806
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • add signature VerifySigning for dotnet tools #39268
    Area-Tools

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-08-17
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Editor and debugger don't agree on breakpoint range #74795
  • CS8344 error even with C# 13 (ref in iterators/async) #74793

PullRequests

Created

  • Move to basic ref assemblies for net40 #74796
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, VSCode
  • Async rename commit #74794
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Needs UX Triage

Merged

  • Move net451 test assets to net461 #74766
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Fix issue where output path set in construction never updated the project update state #74791
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, Next

Updated

  • Update LSP Protocol Types #73911
    Area-Infrastructure, Community, untriaged, VSCode
  • Use single argument overload for `[start..]` of `string` or `(ReadOnly)Span` #74643
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged
  • Reduce allocations from newline information allocated by ChangedText.GetLinesCore #74728
    Area-Compilers, untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-08-17
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Improve Razor Rendering with Null References #57386
  • Add built-in asp.net core admin panel like django-admin #57385
  • Perf regression: json, mvc #57384
  • Perf improvement: single_query, updates #57383
  • Naming inconsistency on `ISkipStatusCodePagesMetadata` feature #57382
  • System.IO.IOException occurs when running any project in Visual Studio 2022 #57381
  • Perf improvement: connectionclose, https, plaintext #57378

Closed

  • Perf regression: ApiCrudListProducts #57352
  • Perf regression: endpoint #57335
  • Perf regression: mvc #57342
  • Perf regression: connectionclose, https #57379
  • Initial Styles don't load correctly On new project when there's a spacing between project name on visual studio #57375
  • Perf improvement: mvc #57334
  • Perf improvement: plaintext #57351
  • Perf regression: fortunes_ef, json #57359
  • Perf improvement: fortunes_dapper #57370
  • Perf regression: json_middleware #57371

PullRequests

Merged

  • [Blazor] Fix navigation lock tests #57372
    area-infrastructure, 10.0-preview1

Updated

  • Use System.Threading.Lock in Kestrel #57236
    community-contribution, area-networking

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-08-17
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Shell Relative Routes Documentation Incorrect? #24292
  • Erro ao Criar um projeto com o .NET MUI APP #24291

Closed

  • Removing TapGestureRecognizer with at least 2 taps causes Exception #21437
    Backlog

PullRequests

Created

  • RefreshView IsEnabled enhancements #24290
    platform/android 🤖, platform/iOS 🍎, area-controls-refreshview

Merged

  • [Android] Removing TapGestureRecognizer with at least 2 taps causes Exception - fix #21714
    platform/android 🤖, community ✨, area-gestures
  • Try and make scroll-to test more solid #24286

Updated

  • Wrap Image with a container on Windows so that it is centered with AspectFill #17665
    platform/windows 🪟, area-controls-image
  • [Android] Add test for scroll without group #24288
    platform/android 🤖, i/regression
  • [Windows] Make `WebView.CaptureAsync()` work #23474
    community ✨
  • Remove non-functioning code and instead throw a more helpful platform-not-supported error #23617
    community ✨
  • CarouselView doesn't scroll to the right Position after changing the ItemSource with Loop enabled #24142
    platform/android 🤖, platform/iOS 🍎, area-controls-collectionview, community ✨
  • [Windows] Optimize `WrapperView` #24281
    community ✨
  • fix 23921 #24275
    community ✨
  • Add support for iOS/Mac specific modals styled as popovers #23984
    community ✨
  • Build the previous TFMs #23896
    area-infrastructure, 9.0-rc1
